subject: In-container testing. Can anybody update on state of tools?
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been looking at tools for integration testing for ejb30 applications (container agnostic) and the two tools I bumped into looked a bit dated Cactus
messageBody:
Hi,

I've been looking at tools for integration testing for ejb30
applications (container agnostic) and the two tools I bumped into
looked a bit dated Cactus and JunitEE. Neither supports junit 4.3
directly. The container version support (start/stop) also looks dated.

What are tools are people out there using for integration testing?

Martin
